overview: The story, which takes place in a hot summer, shows three teenage sisters left alone in the family home after the death of their grandmother, who had raised them. Each one expresses its mourning in a different way in a climate of indolence and apathy and the director shows us, as if they were larvae that finally break their cocoon to fly like adult butterflies, the passage of the protagonists to adulthood.
title: La Furia De Un Sicario
